>
> The confusion deepens. I've changed the activation function to BipolarsSigmoid and guess what: Same input results in the same

> I really don't understand it, but it's great to have a visualizer now :)


I wonder if the wrong parameter or params.txt file is being read when
you're evolving the networks? So they might have been using
BipolarSigmoid all along?
